value:
I'm gonna be a merc when I grow up.
I can't wait to see Oscar's face
when I show him how much I earn.

Rolf is still so small, it's up to me to
watch his back. After all, that's what
big brothers are for.

You let us into your home, so you're
as good as family. If you need any
help, like chopping wood, just ask.

I may be young, but these muscles
pack the punch of someone twice
my age!

I'm gonna work hard, play hard, and
eat lots. That way I'll get super
strong!

Hey there! I brought you something
pretty cool. But I didn't look! It's from
$Nf.

Oh yeah! I'm so strong, I can take on
anyone. Nothing bad's gonna
happen to Rolf while I'm around.

Fights are just about overpowering
the other guy with brute force, right?
I can do that. Let's go, go, go!

How did I... Rgh. Maybe I can
learn something from this...
Thanks for this. I won't let you down!

I'm Boyd. I might be young, but when
I get serious, my determination is
bigger than any adult's—you'll see!

Hey, um... What's your family like?
You know, parents, brothers, sisters,
that sort of thing.$k$pI don't wanna seem rude. I just
haven't seen anyone like that
around, so I was wondering...$k$pAfter Rolf was born and our father
died, without a mother, the three of
us were left to fend for ourselves.$k$pIt wasn't my father's fault, but that
doesn't change the fact that we got
left out in the cold.$k$pThat's why we're so grateful you
took us in. We're gonna do
whatever we can to help you out!
たあっ
やーっ！
うわっ…
ちくしょう…！
Try and stop me!
I've got this!
Gotta be strong!
Not bad, right?
Sorry, Oscar...
へへっ
I'm Boyd. You might know my big brother, Oscar, or my little brother, Rolf.
Hey! Don't sneak up on me!
I've gotta get stronger if I wanna help Oscar.
I'm plenty tough! I can take on any of the kids my age!
Show me to the grub, would ya? I'm starving.
My brother Rolf is a great kid. I've got to make sure he keeps out of trouble.
You put food on our plates and a roof over our heads. Thanks for that.
You got it!
What's the plan?
Ready to go!
